 The fringe width in the Young double-slit <LU LEMMA="fringes" CAT="N" FLX="NEUTER_E" Case="loc" Nb="sg">fringe</LU>
    interferometer ...  ... depends on the spacing between the
      light source and the fringes. ... does not depend on light source
      wavelength. ... depends on the spacing between the
      screens with single and double slit. ... does not depend on the position of
      the observation plane. ... depends o the spacing between the
      fringes. No right answer
